>>Weather Sant'Antoni di Gaddura/Sant'Antonio di Gallura

The climate here is mild, and generally warm and temperate. During the winter season, Sant'Antoni di Gaddura/Sant'Antonio di Gallura experiences a higher amount of precipitation compared to the summer months. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Csa. The temperature here averages 15.5 °C | 59.9 °F. About 565 mm | 22.2 inch of precipitation falls annually.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Sant'Antoni di Gaddura/Sant'Antonio di Gallura

Precipitation is the lowest in July, with an average of 9 mm | 0.4 inch. On average, the highest amount of rainfall occurs during November with a mean value of 80 mm | 3.1 inch.

At an average temperature of 24.4 °C | 75.9 °F, August is the hottest month of the year. On average, the month of February is considered to be the coldest time of year with temperatures averaging at around 8.0 °C | 46.4 °F.
